name: The Complete Web Development Bootcamp 2024
description: Master everything from front-end (HTML, CSS, JS) to back-end (Node.js, databases) to become a full-stack developer. Build real projects as you learn! Over 12,500 students have enrolled and launched their web development careers.

name: WordPress for Beginners: Create a Stunning Website
description: Learn WordPress basics to build a beautiful website without coding. Customize themes, add plugins, and manage content with ease. Empower over 8,200 beginners to create professional-looking websites.

name: Front-End Development Fundamentals: HTML, CSS & JavaScript
description: Gain a solid foundation in web development's core languages: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Learn to structure web pages, style them, and add interactivity. Over 3,100 students have built their foundation for a successful front-end development career.

name: Back-End Development with Node.js & Express
description: Dive into back-end development using Node.js and Express.js. Build APIs, handle databases, and create dynamic web applications. Nearly 600 developers have chosen this course to boost their back-end skills.

name: The Junior Web Developer Career Path
description: Launch your web development career with this comprehensive course. Learn essential skills, build a project portfolio, and prepare for job interviews. Equip over 1,000 aspiring developers with the tools they need to land their first web dev job.
